question: Which of the following represents an advantage of using online direct marketing tools?

answers.text: Online direct marketing allows marketers to target consumers globally because of worldwide access to the internet.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Although answer c is correct, all of the options are correct as well. Advantages of online direct marketing are that it has global reach, is highly targeted, and can be much easier to measure ROI.

answers.text: Online direct marketing is highly targeted in that marketers can reach customers through a variety of digital channels that are inexpensive compared to other promotion tools.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Although answer b is correct, all of the options are correct as well. Advantages of online direct marketing are that it has global reach, is highly targeted, and can be much easier to measure ROI.

answers.text: Online direct marketing allows for easier measurement of ROI on campaigns.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Although answer a is correct, all of the options are correct as well. Advantages of online direct marketing are that it has global reach, is highly targeted, and can be much easier to measure ROI.

answers.text: All of these are advantages of online direct marketing.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Advantages of online direct marketing are that it has global reach, is highly targeted, and can be much easier to measure ROI.

detailedSolution: Advantages of online direct marketing are that it has global reach, is highly targeted, and can be much easier to measure ROI.
